      • OrderItem

        public OrderItem(@NotNull
                 @NotNull String[] otherData)
        A method to read from a CSV string to convert to an object instance This needs to be overridden if you need to retrieve CSV data from file
        Parameters:
        otherData - the split CSV string object for the order item, be it menuitems or promotions
